Description: Green glazed composition shabti of Psamtekseneb(?) with a lappet-wig, a modelled face with a beard and crossed hands in relief holding an adze, a hoe and the string of the seed-basket that hangs over the shoulder; the leg section is inscribed with a column of Hieroglyphic text; the back-pillar bears a motif of a seated figure; plinth beneath the feet.
